typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.Status
typeDescription.description: Supertype for status annotations of a diagnosis, medication etc.

featureDescription.name: statusReference
featureDescription.description: Reference to annotation that specifies/ verifies status.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.StatusIndicator
typeDescription.description: Indicator for a status of a diagnosis, medication etc..

featureDescription.name: interpretation
featureDescription.description: Interpretation of referenced value, e.g. ASSURED, NEGATED, SUSPECTED etc.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.Laterality
typeDescription.description: Laterality of an annotation, e.g. diagnosis or ophthalmology.

featureDescription.name: value
featureDescription.description: Laterality value, e.g. RIGHT, LEFT, BOTH

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.LateralityIndicator
typeDescription.description: Indicator for the laterality of an annotation, e.g. diagnosis or ophthalmology.

featureDescription.name: value
featureDescription.description: Value the indicator stands for, e.g. RIGHT, LEFT, BOTH

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.LateralityForCodeIndicator
typeDescription.description: Indicator for the laterality of an annotation, e.g. diagnosis. Only valid if close to a ICD-10 Code.

featureDescription.name: value
featureDescription.description: Value the indicator stands for, e.g. RIGHT, LEFT, BOTH

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.NotPatientIndicator
typeDescription.description: Indicator for a diagnosis etc. of another person.

featureDescription.name: value
featureDescription.description: Description of the person, not the patient. E.g. "FAMILY" or "OTHER"

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.FamilyIndicator
typeDescription.description: Indicator for a diagnosis in the family.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.Candidate
typeDescription.description: Supertype for candidate annotations of a diagnosis, procedure etc.

featureDescription.name: dictCanon
featureDescription.description: An optional preferred term corresponding to the given id.

featureDescription.name: approach
featureDescription.description: The approach that generated this candidate.
